name: Customizer Field EndPoint
author: Bishal Basnet

sections.description:
Adds Endpoint for current active theme customier fields. ‘wp-json/themes/v1/customizer-fields’

Arbitrary section

You may provide arbitrary sections, in the same format as the ones above. This may be of use for extremely complicated
plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload customizer-end-point.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Access endpoint with /wp-json/themes/v1/customizer-fields

short_description: Add theme mod EndPoint to WP-REST API V2.
